testcase.name: To get the data from the application in JSON format using query parameter
testcase.system-out: Given url 'http://localhost:9897' ......................................... passed And headers {Accept : 'application/json', Content-Type : 'application/json'} . passed * def jobId = function() {return Math.floor((100) * Math.random());} ...... passed * def jid = jobId() ....................................................... passed * def postRequest = call read("../CreateJobEntryReusableWithVariables.feature") { _url:'http://localhost:9897', _path:'/normal/webapi/add', _id:'#(jid)'} . passed Given path '/normal/webapi/find' .......................................... passed And params {id:'#(jid)', jobTitle:'Software Engg - Part2'} ................ passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.jobId == jid ........................................... passed And path '/normal/webapi/remove/'+jid ..................................... passed And method delete ......................................................... passed And status 200 ............................................................ passed
